_comment: Copy this file to webhook_config.json and fill in your credentials

_docs.discord: Create a webhook in Discord channel settings: Server Settings > Integrations > Webhooks
_docs.slack: Create an incoming webhook at https://api.slack.com/apps > Incoming Webhooks
_docs.ifttt: Get your key at https://ifttt.com/maker_webhooks > Documentation
_docs.webhook_site: Get a free token at https://webhook.site (the UUID in the URL)
